archdesc.runner: Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University
did.unittitle: Metropolitan Economic Development Council Archives 1977-1983, n.d.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for use without restrictions

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box/Folder Metropolitan Economic Development Council Archives, M 270, Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Donated to the Special Collections and Archives by the Executive Director of the Metropolitan Economic Development Council in August 1989 by Deed of Gift.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Metropolitan Economic Development Council (MEDC) was formed in 1978 as a way to attract companies to the Richmond area.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Correspondence with various company personnel, publicity for area companies, advertising, speeches, magazine and newspaper articles, and newsletters. Includes information on the American Economic Development Council, Executive Women International, American Industrial Development Council, Industrial Development Authority, and local companies.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are arranged chronologically or alphabetically.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p: The collection is organized in three series: Correspondence arranged by date, Correspondence arranged alphabetically, and subject files.
